settings.title: Healthy Meal Delivery to Fuel Your Lifestyle
settings.content: Transform Your Lifestyle with Nutritious, High-Protein Meals Crafted for Convenience and Taste. Say Goodbye to Shopping and Cooking Hassles
settings.text1: Indulge in the Fusion of Taste and Health: Handcrafted Meals with Premium Wholefood Ingredients for Unmatched Flavor Satisfaction
settings.text2: Personalize Your Nutrition: Select from Our Diverse Meal Ranges, Each Perfectly Balanced for Your Unique Health Goals
settings.text3: Convenience Meets Health: Enjoy Fresh, Snap-Frozen Meals Ready in Minutes, Minimizing Food Wastage and Maximizing Your Time.
settings.text4: Join Our Community: Embark on a Health Journey with Support for Every Goal, from Weight Loss to Muscle Gain

settings.title: Food Delivery That’s Full Of Goodness
settings.text1: Each meal is packed with high-quality, lean proteins to nourish your body and keep you feeling satisfied.
settings.text2: We love using locally sourced, fresh wholefoods and real ingredients. Our chefs try to avoid any additives or artificial ingredients that we can't pronounce.
settings.text3: Calculated calories are consistent across each meal range to take the guesswork out of reaching your daily energy needs.
settings.text4: We use clean, unprocessed ingredients to create food that is both healthy & tastes delicious. We keep sugars & saturated fats to a minimum.

settings.subtitle: Discover the High Protein Meals trusted By the Blues Rugby Team
settings.title: FUELING CHAMPIONS
settings.text: Swolefoods is excited to partner with the Blues Rugby team to provide them with high protein, nutritious meals to fuel their training. We share the same values of fitness and wellness, and believe that healthy eating should be accessible to everyone. Through this partnership, we hope to inspire our community to prioritize their health and make healthier choices in their everyday lives. Join us in our mission to eat healthier and live better with Swolefoods.

settings.title: Swole Range: 450g meal
settings.text: Power Your Muscle Growth with High-Protein, Nutrient-Rich Meals.

settings.title: Active Range: 350g meal
settings.text: Balance Your Day with Perfectly Portioned, Nutrient-Balanced Meals

settings.title: Low Carb Range: 300g meal
settings.text: Achieve Your Weight Goals with Protein-Packed, Low-Carb 'keto friendly' Delights

settings.heading: Our Meal Ranges
settings.subtitle: We have three serving sizes and we call them 'ranges' check out the range names below and the accompanying serving sizes

settings.title: Build Your Own Box
settings.label: Most Popular
settings.text: Select all your favourite meals from our menu. Mix and match to achieve the right balance for your unique lifestyle.

settings.title: Weight Loss set
settings.text: The perfect low-calorie meal with high protein and low carbs per serve to keep you looking toned and feeling satisfied.

settings.title: Performance Set
settings.text: Loaded with high-quality protein, complex carbohydrates and over 550 calories per serve to assist with building lean muscle.

settings.title: Lean Body Set
settings.text: Build the lean, toned body you want with a balanced eating plan to fuel your workouts.

settings.title: Nutritious Meal Plans For Every Body.
settings.text:
Craft Your Ideal Meal Plan:
Select from Goal-Oriented Packs or Customize Your Own for a Tailored Nutrition Experience

settings.subtitle: Become our partner
settings.title: Own a Retail or Health & Fitness Business? Become Our Partner!
settings.text:
Join the fastest growing health and fitness community in New Zealand and make a positive impact in the lives of your customers with our retail partnership programme.

We provide your business with a hands-free added revenue stream and take care of the nutritional needs of your customers to help deliver the results that you both deserve.
